thread.title: Squaw Valley Community of Writers finds food in words
thread.title_full: Squaw Valley Community of Writers finds food in words - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Leah Garchik
title: Squaw Valley Community of Writers finds food in words
text:
Los Train Wreck, including Sands Hall, Sam Barry, Louis B. Jones and Nion McEvoy Los Train Wreck, including Sands Hall, Sam Barry, Louis B. Jones...
This year’s Litquake Barbary Coast Award was bestowed Wednesday night on the Squaw Valley Community of Writers. The writers conference was founded in 1969 by novelists Oakley Hall and Blair Fuller and nonfiction writer David Perlman , science editor of The Chronicle.
